welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sambalpur, a city known for its rich cultural heritage and stunning natural beauty. We hope you enjoy exploring its charming streets, vibrant markets, and the famous Sambalpuri textiles. Have a wonderful time discovering all that our city has to offer!
